smg.text: Temperature falling. Cold and dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Cold and dry. Mainly cloudy. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cold. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
